text: Ami to taderake kichu'i balini, sudhu se katha'i balechi ya apani balate adesa karechilena ye, tomara allahara dasatba abalambana kara yini amara o tomadera palanakarta ami tadera samparke abagata chilama yatadina tadera madhye chilama. Atahpara yakhana apani amake lokantarita karalena, takhana theke apani'i tadera samparke abagata rayechena. Apani sarbabisaye purna parijnata.
